verses.verse: <S%G3767>Therefore<s%> be <S%G3402>imitators<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> as <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5043>children;<s%>

and <S%G4043>walk<s%> in <S%G26>love,<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> you, and <S%G3860>gave<s%> <S%G1438>Himself<s%> up for us, an <S%G4376>offering<s%> and a <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> as a <S%G2175>fragrant<s%> <S%G3744>aroma.<s%>

But do not let <S%G4202>immorality<s%> <S%G2532>or<s%> <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G167>impurity<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4124>greed<s%> <S%G3366>even<s%> be <S%G3687>named<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you, as is <S%G4241>proper<s%> among <S%G40>saints;<s%>

and [there must be no] <S%G151>filthiness<s%> and <S%G3473>silly<s%> <S%G3473>talk,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2160>coarse<s%> <S%G2160>jesting,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> are not <S%G433>fitting,<s%> but <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G2169>giving<s%> of <S%G2169>thanks.<s%>

For <S%G3778>this<s%> you <S%G3609>know<s%> with <S%G1097>certainty,<s%> that <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G4205>immoral<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G169>impure<s%> <S%G169>person<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4123>covetous<s%> <S%G4123>man,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> is an <S%G1496>idolater,<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> in the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> and <S%G2316>God.<s%>

Let <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>one<s%> <S%G538>deceive<s%> you with <S%G2756>empty<s%> <S%G3056>words,<s%> for <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> upon the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G543>disobedience.<s%>
<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> do not be <S%G4830>partakers<s%> with them;
for you were <S%G4218>formerly<s%> <S%G4655>darkness,<s%> but <S%G3568>now<s%> you are <S%G5457>light<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> <S%G4043>walk<s%> as <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G5457>light<s%>
(for the <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of the <S%G5457>light<s%> [consists] in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G19>goodness<s%> and <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> and <S%G225>truth<s%>),
<S%G1381>trying<s%> to <S%G1381>learn<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is <S%G2101>pleasing<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
And do not <S%G4790>participate<s%> in the <S%G175>unfruitful<s%> <S%G2041>deeds<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness,<s%> but <S%G3123>instead<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G1651>expose<s%> them;
for it is <S%G150>disgraceful<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> to <S%G3004>speak<s%> of the things which are <S%G1096>done<s%> by them in <S%G2931>secret.<s%>

But <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G5319>become<s%> <S%G5319>visible<s%> when they are <S%G1651>exposed<s%> by the <S%G5457>light,<s%> for <S%G3956>everything<s%> that <S%G5319>becomes<s%> <S%G5319>visible<s%> is <S%G5457>light.<s%>

For <S%G1352>this<s%> <S%G1352>reason<s%> it <S%G3004>says,<s%> <S%G1453>"Awake,<s%> <S%G2518>sleeper,<s%> And <S%G450>arise<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> And <S%G5547>Christ<s%> will <S%G2017>shine<s%> on you."
<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> be <S%G991>careful<s%> <S%G199><s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> you <S%G4043>walk,<s%> not as <S%G781>unwise<s%> <S%G781>men,<s%> but as <S%G4680>wise,<s%>
<S%G1805>making<s%> the <S%G1805>most<s%> of your <S%G2540>time,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> are <S%G4190>evil.<s%>
<S%G1223>So<s%> <S%G3778><s%> <S%G1223>then<s%> <S%G3778><s%> do not be <S%G878>foolish,<s%> but <S%G4920>understand<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is.
And do not <S%G3182>get<s%> <S%G3182>drunk<s%> with <S%G3631>wine,<s%> for that is <S%G810>dissipation,<s%> but be <S%G4137>filled<s%> with the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%>

<S%G2980>speaking<s%> to <S%G1438>one<s%> <S%G1438>another<s%> in <S%G5568>psalms<s%> and <S%G5215>hymns<s%> and <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G5603>songs,<s%> <S%G103>singing<s%> and <S%G5567>making<s%> <S%G5567>melody<s%> with your <S%G2588>heart<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%>

<S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G2168>giving<s%> <S%G2168>thanks<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G3962>Father;<s%>
and be <S%G5293>subject<s%> to <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another<s%> in the <S%G5401>fear<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
<S%G1135>Wives,<s%> [be subject] to your <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G435>husbands,<s%> as to the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

For the <S%G435>husband<s%> is the <S%G2776>head<s%> of the <S%G1135>wife,<s%> as <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> is the <S%G2776>head<s%> of the <S%G1577>church,<s%> He <S%G846>Himself<s%> [being] the <S%G4990>Savior<s%> of the <S%G4983>body.<s%>

But as the <S%G1577>church<s%> is <S%G5293>subject<s%> to <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G1135>wives<s%> [ought to be] to their <S%G435>husbands<s%> in <S%G3956>everything.<s%>

<S%G435>Husbands,<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> your <S%G1135>wives,<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> and <S%G3860>gave<s%> <S%G1438>Himself<s%> up for her;
that He might <S%G37>sanctify<s%> her, having <S%G2511>cleansed<s%> her by the <S%G3067>washing<s%> of <S%G5204>water<s%> with the <S%G4487>word,<s%>

that He might <S%G3936>present<s%> to <S%G1438>Himself<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> in <S%G1741>all<s%> her <S%G1741>glory,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4696>spot<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4512>wrinkle<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G5108>thing;<s%> but that she should be <S%G40>holy<s%> and <S%G299>blameless.<s%>

<S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G435>husbands<s%> <S%G3784>ought<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G25>love<s%> their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G1135>wives<s%> as their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G4983>bodies.<s%> He who <S%G25>loves<s%> his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%> <S%G25>loves<s%> <S%G1438>himself;<s%>

for <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G4218>ever<s%> <S%G3404>hated<s%> his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> but <S%G1625>nourishes<s%> and <S%G2282>cherishes<s%> it, <S%G2531>just<s%> as <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> [does] the <S%G1577>church,<s%>
<S%G3754>because<s%> we are <S%G3196>members<s%> of His <S%G4983>body.<s%>

For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G473>cause<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> shall <S%G2641>leave<s%> his <S%G3962>father<s%> and <S%G3384>mother,<s%> and shall <S%G4347>cleave<s%> to his <S%G1135>wife;<s%> and the <S%G1417>two<s%> shall <S%G1510>become<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>
<S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G3466>mystery<s%> is <S%G3173>great;<s%> but I am <S%G3004>speaking<s%> with <S%G1519>reference<s%> to <S%G5547>Christ<s%> and the <S%G1577>church.<s%>

<S%G4133>Nevertheless<s%> let <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1520>individual<s%> among you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%> even as <S%G1438>himself;<s%> and [let] the <S%G1135>wife<s%> [see to it] that she <S%G5399>respect<s%> her <S%G435>husband.<s%>
